question: You are responsible for making sure you receive and read all communications from the instructor.
If you accidentally submit the wrong version, but don't realize it until after the deadline, you can just send the instructor the version you meant to submit.
If you disagree with a score on any coursework, you have two weeks to contact your TA about it.
The three quizzes are worth what portion of your total grade?
You need to let your TA or the instructor or a tutor know when you have questions, so that we can help you.
You may not discuss any part of the assignments with anyone else.
You must do your own work.
The instructor wants you to do well in this course and looks forward to working with you.
